data.message: Hello Facebook When do you open the blue badge verification badge in Iraq and the Arab countries I want to document our pages but is not available when it will open

replies.message: Hi Mawlood. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://bit.ly/2y3O4m3. -James

Hello Dear Facebook Dear James The link you gave me in my previous comment to buy the blue badge does not show me Message Page Not available I am asking you when do you open documentation in the Arab countries because I am from Iraq and I want to close my page or buy this badge please
